metadata.Title: CVE-2018-19662 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in libsndfile 1.0.28. There is a buffer over-readin the function i2alaw_array in alaw.c that will lead to a denial ofservice.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-19662` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libsndfile1 - 1.0.25-10ubuntu0.16.04.2
sndfile-programs - 1.0.25-10ubuntu0.16.04.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libsndfile package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.0.25-10ubuntu0.16.04.2').
